      Different type of canPlace() that does not update the ring counter.
      void Tile.change(boolean base, int size, Color e)
      Places a ring or a base in the current tile.
      int[] Board.getPossibleMoves(Color color, boolean base, int size, int playerNumber)
      Generates an array of possible moves for a particular color and particular ring size.

      Creates a array of all possible moves for the given color.
      boolean Tile.hasBase(Color c)
      Checks whether or not this Tile contains a base of the given Color.
      boolean Board.hasRing(boolean base, int size, Color c, int currentPlayer, boolean change)
      Checks if the current ring size can be placed, based on amount of current ring size is left to place for the current player.
